description: Detects creation or execution of UserInitMprLogonScript persistence method Author: Tom Ueltschi (@c_APT_ure). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Logon Scripts (UserInitMprLogonScript)
query: ((process.parent.executable:*\\userinit.exe AND (NOT ((process.executable:(*explorer.exe OR *\\proquota.exe)) OR (process.command_line:(*netlogon*.bat* OR *UsrLogon.cmd* OR *C\:\\WINDOWS\\Explorer.EXE*))))) OR process.command_line:*UserInitMprLogonScript*)
